Package com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.userservice.user.repository.entity

Class UserEducationEntity

java.lang.Object
com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.userservice.user.repository.entity.UserEducationEntity
public class UserEducationEntity extends Object
Represents a user's education record in the DynamoDB database.

This entity stores information about a user's education, including the institution, degree, field of study, start and end dates, and description. It also includes the partition key (PK) and sort key (SK) for DynamoDB and utility methods for key generation.

    • generatePK

      public static String generatePK(String id)
      Generates the partition key (PK) for a given user ID. The PK format is "USER#userId#EDUCATION".
      Parameters:
      id - the user ID to generate the PK.
      Returns:
      the generated PK.

    • generateSK

      public static String generateSK(String educationId)
      Generates the sort key (SK) for a given education ID. The SK format is "EDUCATION#educationId". If the educationId is null or empty, a random UUID is generated.
      Parameters:
      educationId - the education ID to generate the SK.
      Returns:
      the generated SK.

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Retrieves the education ID by parsing the sort key (SK).
      Returns:
      the education ID.
